Josh Groban [New Album]
Sunday, October 7, 2007, posted by [private]at 6:10 PM

Someone asked me to upload this when it leaked out and I'm going to do
it for whomever that was. I think this guy is pretty cute and I'm a
girl in case if anybody is still wondering what gender I am so that's
why I think he's cute. He is Josh Groban and I like his music, I think
he's great. Anyways, here is his Christmas album called Noel and it
will be released on October 9th. Enjoy!!!

Track Listing:::

1. Silent Night
2. Little Drummer Boy
3. I'll Be Home For Christmas
4. Ave Maria
5. Angels We Have Heard On High
6. Thankful
7. The Christmas Song
8. What Child Is This?
9. The First Noel (Duet With Faith Hill)
10. Petit Papa Noel
11. It Came Upon A Midnight Clear
12. Panis Angelicus
13. O Come All Ye Faithful (With The Mormon Tabernacle Choir)

:: Download ::
Josh Groban - Noel - UNAUTHORIZED DOWNLOAD
:: Download ::

You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that the

services are within the scope of the DMCA.

I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and

Truthfully,
